data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perger, Robert, Guerra, Fernando (2016): The description of a new calyptrate fly mimicking species of the fungus weevil genus Gymnognathus Schönherr 1826 from the southern Bolivian Andes (Coleoptera: Anthribidae: Anthribinae). Zootaxa 4084 (2): 277-284, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.2.7|1 occurrence
